document.full_text: shipping magnate john fredriksen said u.s. regulator lawsuits against two of his trading firms for suspected oil price manipulation in 2008 were "rubbish," a norwegian newspaper reported on thursday.
document.title: fredriksen calls u.s. charges on oil prices "rubbish": report
lines_and_colors: shipping magnate john fredriksen said u.s. regulator lawsuits against two of his trading firms for suspected oil price manipulation in 2008 were "rubbish," a norwegian newspaper reported on thursday.
